name: Folcroft Monastery
description:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights. If you are sensitive to this, please use caution or avoid playing.

Story
You've been hired by an outfit known as SMS Group to retrieve an artifact lost somewhere inside the abandoned Folcroft Monastery. Locals say the place is haunted by restless spirits, but the pay was too good to pass up. You asked little questions. Find the artifact requested and get out alive.

Expect anywhere from 30-45 minutes to complete this game.

Features:
  • Walking Simulator
  • Atmospheric
  • Puzzles
  • Storytelling
  • Jumpscares and Ambient Scares
  • Headphones Recommended
